response:
Urgent imaging of the entire neuraxis is required to confirm the location and nature of the lesions and to check for dissemination in time (chronic plaques). CSF analysis and specific antibody testing (AQP4, MOG) are critical to differentiate between MS, NMOSD, and MOGAD, as this dictates long-term management. Baseline bloods exclude infectious or metabolic mimics.
